title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: Did you know this shitcoin, which is mined using ASICs for Ethereum?On September 26, this coin was worth 1-2 cents, and now its price is 44 cents. And some miners then switched ASICs to this shitcoin.While the coin is being traded on the xeggex exchangehttps://xeggex.com/market/XPB_USDTXPB+ZILhttps://k1pool.com/pool/zil/how-to-start#xpbzil

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: We’re thrilled to announce that the PowBlocks  Kickstarter has concluded and $XPB will list on #MEXC!Deposit: OpenedXPB/USDT Trading: Dec 3, 11:00 (UTC)https://twitter.com/MEXC_Official/status/1731238331940553082This coin is not for mining on video cards.But you can also mine shitcoins on ASICs before entering the stock exchange, when there are few miners.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: You can now remove your WXPB bets from the old pool and re-list them into the new pool. The distribution of rewards in the new pool will begin with 1,500,000 blocks.https://t.me/journalmainera/3256Visit the new pool at: https://stake2.powblocks.com/Below, you will discover answers to some of the most frequently asked questions. If you can't find the information you're seeking, don't hesitate to reach out in our social groups.https://stake2.powblocks.com/#/faq

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: "PowBlocks ($XPB) and MetaChain ($META) has been merger and rebranded to LuxChain ($LUX)." -information from the project discordhttps://t.me/journalmainera/3363LuxChain draws inspiration from the legacy of Proof of Work mechanisms, combining this proven security with groundbreaking features tailored for DeFi, NFTs, and smart contract functionality.https://luxchain.io/TOKENOMICSLuxChain employs a stringent block reward reduction strategy, decreasing rewards by 5% every 100,000 blocks and capping the supply at 33 million to ensure scarcity and enhance long-term value, distinguishing it from other PoW coins with unlimited supplies.Ticker   LUXMax Supply   33,000,000Allocation for 1:1 swap (XPB and META)   20,000,000Proof of Work Mining   10,000,000Development   3,000,000https://luxchain.io/#technology

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: LuxChain says bye bye   :"We regret to announce that we are unable to continue the LuxChain project. We were scammed by a Turkish marketing team and have not received the support we hoped for from the community. Many are labeling us as scams and rugs, and people are cursing us in our inboxes. We have lost the motivation to proceed. As a result, we will be withdrawing liquidity from Uniswap and closing LuxChain. If you are a major holder of $LUX, you may consider taking over the project."https://luxchain.io/
